alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 11:34AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Oklahoma and northwestern Cleveland Counties through NOON CDT... At 1133 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southwestern Oklahoma City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Choctaw, Harrah, Spencer, Jones, Nicoma Park, Luther, Valley Brook, Tinker Air Force Base, Forest Park, Smith Village and Will Rogers Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 119 and 131. Interstate 40 between mile markers 149 and 164. Interstate 44 between mile markers 110 and 118, and between mile markers 145 and 151. Interstate 240 between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
